document.docTitle: Microscydmus (Valdivioconnus) absconditus Jałoszyński & Newton 2017, comb. n.
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XV. Disentangling the Euconnus - Sciacharis knot (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

heading.emphasis:
Microscydmus ( Valdivioconnus ) absconditus ( Schaufuss, 1866 )
, comb. n. CHILE

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Scydmaenus abscondidus
Schaufuss, 1866 : 61
; originally spelled
abscondidus
(pp. 35,61); spelled
absconditus
by
Csiki (1919: 45)
and all subsequent authors, deemed to be correct original spelling.
Euconnus ( Euconnus ) absconditus (Schaufuss)
; Csiki 1919 .

Sciacharis ( Valdivioconnus ) absconditus (Schaufuss)
;
Franz, 1993a : 101
.
